Motherwell, Wishaw and Carluke
At the 2024 election, new boundaries came into effect.
The main communities making up this new constituency are Motherwell, Wishaw, Carluke, Law, Overtown, Carfin, New Stevenson, Forth, Braehead, Woolfords, Auchengray and Tarbrax.
If you aren't sure which constituency is yours, you can check here - it will also be printed on your polling card you receive before election day.
Wishaw Neonatal Warriors
In recent months I have been supporting the inspiring Wishaw Neonatal Warriors, a group of local families who are campaigning to stop the SNP Scottish Government’s downgrade of the award-winning neonatal unit at University Hospital Wishaw.
This unit serves families across Lanarkshire and beyond. Without it, the sickest and most premature babies would have to be moved and treated in Glasgow, Edinburgh or Aberdeen, depending on capacity on the day. This means separating babies and mums from their loved ones when they need them most.
It is time for this ridiculous decision to be reversed.
My Pledges
Fight for real help now to tackle the cost-of-living crisis.
Campaign for better services to make our NHS fit for the future.
Work to create new high quality local jobs and opportunities.
Promote our high streets and local businesses.
Oppose SNP tax hikes and Tory mortgage bombshells.
